image.description: An illustration depicting a river flowing through a lush landscape with trees and foliage on its banks. The poem's text is overlaid on this image.

stanza: Bright you sparkle on your way;
Through the flowers and foliage glancing,
On you rush through rough and smooth;
Broad and deep, and still as time;
Seeming still, yet still in motion,
Down you dash into the sea,
Sea that line hath never sounded,
Sea that sail hath never rounded,
